comments.text: I love that Tapptec combines 5+ tools into 1 & has the following features: detects hidden wires & pipes, smart tape measure (esp. 1 click saving of incremental measurements), OLED dual displays, laser assisted leveling & precise measurements, dual headed laser projections, digital angle guage, quick area & volume calculations, & effortless switch b/w units/unit convertions.

Regarding the product introduction, TappTec is powerful enough to cover all of my needs during daily work on construction sites. I would like to focus more on understanding its software solution behavior. If you could take a look at the app called "magicplan": https://www.magicplan.app/, you notice that they are offering the measurement and documents management features via LIDAR camera and smart phone/pad HW, which helps me a lot, if TappTec can be integrated into the app, it will be awesome. What's more I am also seeking for some cheap tool which can support on-site layout feature i.e. Leica ICON ics20/ics50, Trimble Ri and other total station could offer. maybe that could be the direction for your next step. thanks.
Iâ€™m so excited for this product!!
